edu.cwru.sepia.environment.model.state

Class Template<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cwru.sepia.environment.model.state.Template<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeepEquatable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnitTemplate, UpgradeTemplate

    public abstract class Template<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, DeepEquatable
    Signifies that an implementing class provides generic details about a specific object. Also provides a means for creating factory methods for specific kinds of game objects.
    Author:
    Tim
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getBuildPrerequisites

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getBuildPrerequisites()
        Get the set of template ids of buildings (or units in general) that are required before this template can be made.
        This list is mutable, changing it will alter the things needed to make this template.
        Returns:
        A set of template ids for prerequisite buildings/units

      • getUpgradePrerequisites

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getUpgradePrerequisites()
        Get the set of template ids of upgrades that must be researched before this template can be made.
        This list is mutable, changing it will alter the things needed to make this template.
        Returns:
        A set of template ids for prerequisite upgrades.
